auto_attendant_script: It's a beautiful day at the beach! Thank you for calling Platinum Vacations and Platinum Realty. This call will be recorded for quality and training purposes. Please select one of the following options to better assist you. Press 1 for new reservations or questions on an existing reservation Press 2 if you are currently staying in one of our vacation rentals and need assistance. Press 3 if you are interested in buying or selling a property and Press 4 if you are a long-term tenant or have questions on long-term rentals. Option 1 – goes to Nicole. After 3 rings, ring Aaron, Hans, Melissa, and Esta Option 2 – goes to Hans, Lisa, and Aaron. After 3 rings, ring Nicole and Esta. Option 3 – goes to Justin. After 3 rings, ring Aaron. Option 4 – goes to Drew. After 3 rings, go to Aaron. No answer on any of the above, go to VM: We apologize, we are currently busy on the other line at this moment. If you could please leave us a voicemail message, we will call you back as soon as we can. Thank you and have a great day! VM to go to: platinum@psofd.com
after_hours_script:

If no answer, oes to VM. After these timeframes, automatically goes to VM. We apologize, you have reached us after our normal operating hours. If you could please leave us a voicemail message, our reservations team will call you back tomorrow. Thank you! Option 4 – goes to VM and emails to platinum@psofd.com

call_recording: Notes: Customer wants to manually “roll/unroll” phones. They do not want timeframes set up currently. They also have a Friday lunch meeting. They want a specific VM for this time as well that they can manually “roll/unroll”. VM script for lunch: It's been a beautiful day at the beach, we are currently in an office lunch meeting and will be back soon. Are you a guest staying in one of our vacation rental properties and need help? Please press 1. Are you interested in Real Estate? Please press 2. Are you interested in making a reservation or have other questions? Please press 2 and leave us a voicemail message and we will call you back shortly. Thank you! Option 1 – transfers to on-call tech at 323-391-7263 Option 2 – transfer to on-call Real Estate phone at 850-217-9460 Option 3 – goes to VM and emails to platinum@psofd.com Please leave us a detailed voicemail message and we will call you back shortly. Thank you!
